code: import*as types from'../types';export function getLists(){return{type:types.GET_LISTS_REQUEST,payload:null};}export function postList(data){return{type:types.POST_LIST_REQUEST,payload:data};}export function editList(id,data){return{type:types.PUT_LIST_REQUEST,payload:{id:id,data:data}};}export function deleteList(id){return{type:types.DELETE_LIST_REQUEST,payload:id};}
